sll $0,$0,0
addi $30,$0,0x1001
sll $30,$30,16

addi $1,$0,0x1
addi $2,$0,0x2
addi $3,$0,0x4
addi $4,$0,0x4


sw $1,0($30)
sw $2,4($30)
sw $3,8($30)
sw $4,12($30)

lw $5,0($30)
lw $6,4($30)
bne $5,$6,label1
beq $0,$0,wrong


wrong:
addi $31 $0, 1
halt

label1:
lw $7,8($30)
lw $8,12($30)
beq $7,$8,label2
bne $0,$0,wrong

label2:
addi $31 $0, 0x2
halt
